traits.Amphibious: The crab can breathe air and water.
traits.Shell Camouflage: While the crab remains motionless with its eyestalks and pincers tucked close to its body, it resembles a natural formation or a pile of detritus. A creature within 30 feet of it can discern its true nature with a successful DC 15+1d6 + 12 Intelligence (Nature) check.
